name: laravel-api-backend
description: Production-ready Laravel REST API with Sanctum authentication, API resources, feature flags via Pennant, job queues, and a test suite scaffolded with Pest. Built for teams building mobile or SPA frontends on a solid PHP backend.
unified_instruction:
# Laravel API Backend

## Stack
- **Framework**: Laravel 11+
- **Auth**: Laravel Sanctum (token-based)
- **Testing**: Pest PHP
- **Queues**: Laravel Horizon (Redis)
- **Feature Flags**: Laravel Pennant
- **Language**: PHP 8.3+

## Project Structure
```
app/
  Http/
    Controllers/Api/  # Versioned API controllers
    Resources/        # API Resource transformers
    Requests/         # Form Request validation classes
  Models/             # Eloquent models
  Jobs/               # Queueable jobs
  Events/ Listeners/  # Event system
database/
  migrations/         # Database migrations
  factories/          # Model factories for testing
tests/
  Feature/            # Pest feature tests
  Unit/               # Pest unit tests
```

## Conventions
- All API routes are versioned: `/api/v1/...`
- Controllers are thin â€” business logic lives in service classes or actions
- Every endpoint has a corresponding Pest feature test
- Use API Resources for all JSON responses (never return raw models)
- Validation lives in Form Request classes, never in controllers

## Key Commands
```bash
php artisan serve          # Start dev server
php artisan test           # Run Pest test suite
php artisan horizon        # Start queue worker UI
php artisan tinker         # Interactive REPL
```
